Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays an earlier door problem on a train at Indiana. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays an earlier door problem on a train at Indiana.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
